### Functions

You can set default values like this:
```{r}
sim_norm<-function(N,mu=0,sigma=1)
```
This is preferred over hardcoding parameter values inside the function. 

#### Rescale example function
```{r}
rescale01 <- function(x) {
  rng <- range(x, na.rm = TRUE, finite = TRUE)
  y <- (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1])
  y[y == -Inf] <- 0
  y[y == Inf] <- 1
  y
}
```

#### FizzBuzz example function

```{r}
fizzbuzz <- function(x) {
  stopifnot(length(x) == 1)
  stopifnot(is.numeric(x))
  if (!(x %% 3) && !(x %% 5)) {
    "fizzbuzz"
  } else if (!(x %% 3)) {
    "fizz"
  } else if (!(x %% 5)) {
    "buzz"
  } else {
    as.character(x)
  }
}
```
